Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::PurgeProductsRequest

Request message for the PurgeProducts method.

Methods

#product_set_purge_config

#product_set_purge_config => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ProductSetPurgeConfig
Returns
Type Description
::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ProductSetPurgeConfig

Specify which ProductSet contains the Products to be deleted.

#product_set_purge_config=(value) => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ProductSetPurgeConfig
Returns
Type Description
::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ProductSetPurgeConfig

Specify which ProductSet contains the Products to be deleted.

#delete_orphan_products

#delete_orphan_products => ::Boolean
Returns
Type Description
::Boolean

If delete_orphan_products is true, all Products that are not in any ProductSet will be deleted.

#delete_orphan_products=

#delete_orphan_products=(value) => ::Boolean
Returns
Type Description
::Boolean

If delete_orphan_products is true, all Products that are not in any ProductSet will be deleted.

#parent

#parent => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

Required. The project and location in which the Products should be deleted.

Format is projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOC_ID.

#parent=

#parent=(value) => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

Required. The project and location in which the Products should be deleted.

Format is projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOC_ID.

#force

#force => ::Boolean
Returns
Type Description
::Boolean

The default value is false. Override this value to true to actually perform the purge.

#force=

#force=(value) => ::Boolean
Returns
Type Description
::Boolean

The default value is false. Override this value to true to actually perform the purge.
